entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then rain showers and flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
